title: Learning How to Heal Yourself with Plants: Herbs for Energy and Pleasure with Karen Rose
description: Herbal medicine can give you energy and support a more pleasurable life! In this class, participants will learn about the herbs that can restore the body's vitality and enliven the spirit. The founder and owner of Sacred Vibes Healing and the Sacred Vibes Apothecary in Brooklyn, Karen Rose is trained in Eastern and Western herbal medicine and is personally dedicated to empowering individuals to make informed decisions regarding their health and lives.
cleaned_text: Courtesy Greg Costanzo Herbal medicine can give you energy and support a more pleasurable life! In this class, participants will learn about the herbs that can restore the body's vitality and enliven the spirit. The founder and owner of Sacred Vibes Healing and the Sacred Vibes Apothecary in Brooklyn, Karen Rose is trained in Eastern and Western herbal medicine and is personally dedicated to empowering individuals to make informed decisions regarding their health and lives. For her series of workshops at the New Museum, Rose will draw from over fifteen years of experience as a community, clinical, and formulary master herbalist, and will focus on how women may live inspired lives using the energies of plants. This workshop is offered in conjunction with ["Simone Leigh: The Waiting Room."](http://www.newmuseum.org/exhibitions/view/simone-leigh-the-waiting-room) To attend a session, participants must sign up in the New Museum Lobby on the day of the class. Space is limited, and admission is available on a first-come, first-served basis. Queries related to services and programs offered through "The Waiting Room" can be directed to [waitingroom@newmuseum.org](mailto:waitingroom@newmuseum.org). Additional workshops in the "Learning to Heal Yourself with Plants" series include: [Kitchen Medicinals](http://www.newmuseum.org/calendar/view/734/simone-leigh-the-waiting-room-learning-how-to-heal-yourself-with-plants-six-week-herbalism-course) Saturday July 9, 2-3 PM [Herbs for Womb Healing and Pregnancy](http://www.newmuseum.org/calendar/view/1035/learning-how-to-heal-yourself-with-plants-herbs-for-womb-healing-and-pregnancy-with-karen-rose) Saturday July 23, 2-3 PM [Herbs for PTSD and Trauma](http://www.newmuseum.org/calendar/view/738/learning-how-to-heal-yourself-with-plants-herbs-for-ptsd-and-trauma-with-karen-rose) Saturday July 30, 2-3 PM [Herbs for Elders](http://www.newmuseum.org/calendar/view/739/learning-how-to-heal-yourself-with-plants-herbs-for-elders-with-karen-rose) Saturday August 6, 2-3 PM [Herbs for Children](http://www.newmuseum.org/calendar/view/740/learning-how-to-heal-yourself-with-plants-herbs-for-children-with-karen-rose) Saturday August 6, 2-3 PM Help us improve our website by taking a 5-minute survey with a chance
